name: Dino Clicker (itch) (YaBroBlackCat)
description: Click Mr. Dino to get some Dino Nuggies. You can then use those Dino Nuggies to buy things like new looks new backgrounds and even multipliers. The Nuggie multiplier makes it so when you click Mr. Dino you get X2 the Nuggies. The Choco Milk multiplier makes it so X2 more Choco Milk comes. The chocolate milk comes very 20 seconds - 5 minutes so be ready. The Choco Milk gives you 20 • Nuggie multiplier amount of Nuggies. Please report any bugs to me. Thank you for playing Dino Clicker.
